title: Requires manufacturers and labelers of prescription drugs dispensed in this state to annually report marketing expenses to the department of health
summary: Requires manufacturers and labelers of prescription drugs dispensed in this state which engage in marketing activities in the state to annually report marketing expenses to the department of health; imposes a $10,000 civil fine for failure to report.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the manufacturer or labeler of each prescription drug to annually report the marketing costs of such drug to the department of health
